representation_information.name: MXF Operational Pattern 1a (OP1a), with Lossless JPEG 2000 in Generic Container
representation_information.description: MXF OP1a file with a video essence encoded as a series of frame images, each encoded using JPEG 2000 core coding. One expert stated that the frame images could be either fully realized JPEG 2000 files (jp2 extension), or simple JPEG 2000 codestreams.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
